Articles.Content: ''We expect modders to dig into KSP2 on day one. We recognize that the modding community has played a big role in the longevity of KSP, and we continue to be impressed by the mods that are released. The intent with KSP 2 is to improve the modding experience even further, and we look forward to hearing feedback from modders over the course of early access.'' is the answer to the question ''will there be mods in ksp2 early access'' on the FAQ of the website, and i wonder what will be the first custom planet pack in ksp2 and if anyone has arleady started working on them. I know the game is not in the best state right now with the framerate and etc, but i was just wondering
ive heard that someone has been able to make a basic custom planet, but as far as i know thats all there is in the custom planet department
There is an experimental planet pack currently available. It's BepInEx based, just extract it in your game folder after installing BepInEx or SpaceWarp. More will be coming soon hopefully.
